// Pivot 0, 0
int palanca[20] = {
	2, 0,
	57, 0,
	60, 3,
	60, 16,
	57, 20,
	52, 19,
	4, 12,
	0, 8,
	0, 3,
	2, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float palanca[20] = {
	0.033333f, 0.000000f,
	0.950000f, 0.000000f,
	1.000000f, 0.150000f,
	1.000000f, 0.800000f,
	0.950000f, 1.000000f,
	0.866667f, 0.950000f,
	0.066667f, 0.600000f,
	0.000000f, 0.400000f,
	0.000000f, 0.150000f,
	0.033333f, 0.000000f
};
